quotes.quote: The heyday of woman's life is the shady side of fifty.
Love of honor is a very shady sort of possession.
Locked up from mortal eye in shady leaves of destiny.
The economic game is not supposed to be rigged like some shady ring toss on a carnival midway.
Beautiful, delightful, noble, memorable, as is the world you and yours frequent, I yet am well content in my shady crevice.
The Riviera isn't only a sunny place for shady people.
It's easier to hide your light under a bushel than to keep your shady side dark.
Do not fear the shadowy places. You will never be the first one there. Another went ahead and down until He came out the other side.
A shady business never yields a sunny life.
If you were a shadowy, anonymous figure, it made sense to pretend everything had gone according to some diabolical plan. Never mind if it hadn't.
Beginnings are apt to be shadowy.
Everywhere we see shadowy minds, cloudy brains! World needs more light of wisdom!
Once dishonesty is introduced, distrust becomes the hallmark of future dealings or associations.

The cave is a dark, shadowy place. It's a place that's very close and yet distant at the same time, and it's a place of revelation and isolation. Your form, your body, your writing is your confinement.
There is no greater dishonesty than man effecting his own private gains at the expense of others.
A shady friend for torrid days Is easier to find than one of higher temperature for frigid hour of mind.
